Title:
Multi-gene phylogeny of Astrosphaeriella vesuvius (Berk.
& Broome) D. Hawksw and report of its anamorph as Pithomyces flavus
Berk. & Br.
Abstract:
Pithomyces flavus Berk. & Br. is re-described as
anamorph of Astrosphaeriella vesuvius (Berk. & Broome) D. Hawks.
Multi-gene molecular phylogenetic analysis is provided to support this
new connection and identity of teleomorph. Fungus is epitypified
here.
